question:
If \(S^2 > T^2\) , which of the following must be true?
(A) \(S > T\)
(B) \(S^2 > T\)
(C) \(ST > 0\)
(D) \(|S| > |T|\)
(E) \(ST < 0\)
Kudos for
R.A.E
